bot_list_notification.description_1: You don't have any A.I TRADING.

expired.title: Expired
expired.description: has expired. Please renew a new plan to keep auto trading.

insufficient_balance.title: Insufficient balance
insufficient_balance.description_1: has stopped working caused by your balance is lower than the minimum requirement. Please keep your balance higher than minimum balance requirement.

remove-account.title: Remove account
remove-account.description_1: Your Trading Bot will stop auto trade.
remove-account.description_2: Don’t worry, you can add this account to this bot again any time.
remove-account.description_highlight: You can’t login into other account to this bot.

insufficient_account.title: Insufficient account
insufficient_account.description: In order to resume utilization of the A.I. Trading services, it is necessary to fulfill the initial registration requirements, including a minimum deposit of

max_drawdown_warning.title: Maxdrawdown warning
max_drawdown_warning.description: When you continue to use A.I Trading, the system will reset from scratch according to the amount you currently have.
